title: Chatuan Jeho lo kal la
lyrics:
Chatuan Jeho, lo kal la,
Mihring ngaih rual loh reng;
Hmangaih leh that tuifinriat,
Nangmah maiah a cheng.
Mihring sual lam lo pan hi,
Amah tungding langin;
A tawng leh a nungchang chuan,
A fak kumkhua ang che.

Hremhmun, thil sual bengtla lo,
Thihna ka leh thlan nen;
Buaina tlang nen teh theih pawh,
Lungngaih thlaler ata,
Mihring i chhan chhuah vang leh,
Vana i hruai vang hian;
Hmun chungnung ber a khat e,
Lawm hla reh thei lo khan.

Kei, mi rethei engtik pawh,
Van lut min hmu sela;
Lawm hla chu a ropui dawn,
A tawng a mak bawk ang.
Lal Kristaah kan hneh zo,
A kin, a kin tawh e;
Tin, chatuanah thangkhawk se,
A kin, a kin tawh e.
